title: Soap & Glory Hand Food Hand Cream 125ml
description: Contains shea butter, macadamia oil and marshmallow . Scented with our Original Pink fragrance. The most astonishing hand cream ever? You decide!

title: Soap & Glory Clean On Me Creamy Clarifying Shower Gel 500ml
description: Soft, smooth, sexy skin whenever you want it. Contains natural mandarin peel extract and a bonus built-in body lotion. Scented with our Original Pink fragrance.

title: Soap & Glory Flake Away Body Scrub 300ml
description: A superhero strength skin smoothing body polish with shea butter, sweet almond oil, peach seed powder, sea salt and sugar. Transforms your scaly legs from reptilian to radiant. Scented with Soap & Glory's Original PinkTM fragrance.
